description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

description.data: Prized in ancient times for medicinal properties, the aniseed in DeKuyper Anisette adds an exotic palate to traditional as well as modern cocktails. Distilled with imported aniseed and blended with fine neutral spirit, this liqueur's fresh black licorice flavor shines through. With its rich, deep flavor, Anisette makes a perfect addition to after-dinner cocktails. Update the classic Martini as a Black Anisette Martini, adding DeKuyper Blackberry and Vanilla with vodka, lime juice and muddled fresh blackberries, balancing sweetness with its distinctive flavor. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise with modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, bitter, salty, sour, with a subtle smoky finish.

description.data: Smoother than any other rum of its proof, Cruzan 151 is aged for a minimum of one year in American oak barrels and is crafted using a meticulous process. Offering a strong, rich and pronounced flavor, this rum is best served with your favorite mixer. Try it mixed with tropical fruit juices like a Cruzan Voodoo Hurricane cocktail by combining one part each Cruzan 151, Aged Dark and Vanilla Rum along with three parts each orange juice and pineapple juice and a half-part of grenadine. Mix well, pour over crushed ice in a tall glass and garnish with a fruit wedge. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold, fiery, and robust.

description.data: Hailing from Tequila, Jalisco in Mexico, Hornitos Tequila (named after the “little ovens” used to roast agave) was introduced to the world in 1950 by our founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day.Hornitos Cristalino is a different kind of aged tequila. Crafted using our rich and flavorful Añejo, we refine this select spirit for crystal clarity and exceptional smoothness. It’s not what you would expect. Then again, the best things never are.

description.data: With a balanced, juicy fresh melon aroma, Pinnacle Cucumber Watermelon Vodka offers the palate a taste of crisp cucumber and clean melon. This unique vodka dresses up any drink, making it a perfect choice for brunch, evening or any time. Stir into lemon-lime or club soda for a refreshing twist on a classic. For a refreshing cocktail, try a Pinnacle Summer Breeze by adding one part Pinnacle Cucumber Watermelon Vodka with two parts grapefruit juice and one-quarter part freshly squeezed lime. Shake with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a watermelon wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Crisp refreshing cucumber with a subtle hint of sweetness.

description.data: Unleash the bold spirit of Jim Beam Devil’s Cut, a premium bourbon with depth and complexity that comes from liquid extracted from inside the barrel wood. We use a proprietary process that extracts the rich bourbon trapped inside the barrel wood. When ready, we then blend this liquid with extra-aged bourbon and bottle it at 90 proof for robust, premium bourbon with deep color, aroma and character.

description.data: Discover the ultra-limited second release of Hardin’s Creek, Colonel James B. Beam Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. Taken off the still at a low distillation proof then intentionally aged at just 2 years for a fullness of flavor and complexity usually reserved for more mature bourbons. The result after just 2 years in the barrel is an incredibly robust flavor and proof that quality isn't solely defined by time. Inspired by its namesake’s post-Prohibition bourbon, Colonel James B. Beam boasts notes of vanilla, earthiness of nuts and oak and a distinctive caramel body. It takes whiskey beyond what it’s expected to be and towards what it could be.

tastingNotesText.data: Oak, green peppercorn, and light tobacco.

text.data: An ever-evolving series of releases that features some of our rarest and most unique whiskies, Hardin’s Creek will chart the rich experience and distilling knowledge of the James B. Beam Distilling Company
Hardin’s Creek is the birthplace of the Beam Family’s distilling legacy - the small creek flows into a river in the foothills of Central Kentucky, where Jacob Beam’s legacy was born in 1795
Over 227 years, eight generations of master distillers have built a deep well of whiskey expertise

description.data: The Maker’s Mark Wood Finishing Series returns with Unsung Heroes, Series 2 in our ongoing series of limited-edition bourbons. In this series, we explore the taste visions of those who know our bourbon best – the makers of Maker’s. The Heart Release is the first of five volumes in the series, and brings us a fruit-forward gem. This release utilizes two custom French oak staves to achieve its one-of-a-kind flavor. The whisky features tasting notes of caramel, maple and chocolate presented with a mouthfeel and finish sure to delight. Enjoy The Heart Release from Maker’s Mark Wood Finishing Series neat or on the rocks to fully appreciate the delicate and balanced notes of this barrel-finished whisky.

tastingNotesText.data: Brown sugar sweetness, caramel, cinnamon, and charred oak. With smooth spicy finish.

text.data: Features a complex aroma due to the Wood Finishing
Featuring a one-of-a-kind finish that is distinctively Maker's Mark

description.data: Bring the taste of the tropics to your cocktail with DeKuyper Pucker Island Punch Schnapps Imitation Liqueur. Bursting with the sweet and sour taste of tropical fruit, this blue liqueur is a staple for summertime beverages. Enhance the taste of melon, banana and other fruit cocktails with its satisfying island flavor. Pour it with Pinnacle® Vodka, DeKuyper Crème de Banana and pineapple juice for a Blue Banana, a summer vacation in a glass. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Plata Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Plata is made from 100% blue agave for a smooth-tasting plata tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring playful citrus notes along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Plata Tequila also offers a short but smooth finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita or Paloma, Hornitos Plata delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

description.data: With winds of at least 137 knots, the Category 5 hurricane is unrelenting. In September 2017, Hurricane Maria ripped through the US Virgin Islands, causing severe damage to homes, communication networks, and the power grid. On Cruzan’s home of St. Croix, neighbors came together to help each other and renew their island, inspiring Cruzan Rum to amplify and sustain this “Island Spirit”. Bottled at 137 proof, Cruzan Hurricane Proof rum pays tribute to the resilient spirit that allows communities to stand strong in the face of disaster – a bold reminder that together we can weather any storm. Following the devastating 2017 Atlantic Hurricane season, Cruzan Rum established the Island Spirit Fund to ensure no community weathers a storm alone. A portion of proceeds from every bottle of Cruzan Hurricane Proof Rum supports disaster recovery efforts in the US Virgin Islands and across the United States. For more detail on the Island Spirit Fund, visit cruzanrum.com.

description.data: Don’t be fooled by the sweet blueberry taste of Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade--this rum packs a punch of flavor. Combining the smooth quality of Cruzan Rum with sweet fruity blueberry flavors and tangy tastes of lemon, this well-rounded fruity rum offers a citrus-sweet bite. Add one part fresh-squeezed lemonade for an adult twist on a classic summer lemonade or try a Blueberry Lemonade Cooler by combining two parts Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade Rum, three-quarters part fresh grapefruit juice and a small pinch of salt over ice in a shaker. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds, double strain into a Collins glass over ice and top with seltzer water. Garnish the cocktail with a twist of grapefruit peel. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Known for its innovative flavor choices, EFFEN Vodka is ahead of the curve once again with EFFEN Cucumber Vodka. With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. It pairs well with melons such as cantaloupe or watermelon, can provide a crisp twist to a traditional martini and also mixes well with soda water, tonic or lemon-lime soda to create a cool, refreshing cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Vine ripe cucumber

text.data: EFFEN® Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN® starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN® is distilled continuously at temps below 85˚, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN® is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails

description.data: Pinnacle Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka offers a robust and succulent ruby red grapefruit taste with tangy citrus undertones. description.data: Classic and bold, Gilbey's Gin is an exceptionally balanced London Dry Gin. Classic juniper combines with citrus and floral notes, creating a citrus-forward, clean, light, and dry palate. Each sip finishes intense but smoothly, with lingering orange/citrus notes. During distillation, gin’s flavor is introduced to the alcohol when it is in a vaporous form and made to pass through a "filter" of juniper berries, herbs and spices. Distinct juniper and citrus notes make Gilbey's a staple for cocktails like the classic martini and gin and tonic, or serve it with fruit juice or fruit soda for a fun and refreshing beverage. It became such a popular gin throughout the world that a license to produce it in the United States was granted in 1938.

description.data: If you're looking for a smooth, sweet and easy-to-drink whisky, you've found it. Maker's Mark Classic Bourbon was carefully developed by sixth-generation distiller Bill Samuels Sr. to be just that. Still made to his unique recipe, this full-flavored bourbon is subtly woody with flavors of vanilla, caramel and fruit. It's easy to drink neat, and can pull its weight in a cocktail. Mix it with ginger ale and lime for an effortless long drink.This one literally changed the way we think about bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr., wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's approachably smooth. To ensure consistency, we still rotate every barrel by hand and age our bourbon to taste, not time. Just like Bill would have wanted. Once it's ready it's bottled at 90 proof, hand-dipped in our signature red wax. Just think of it as our seal of approval.Since its establishment, Maker's Mark has continually impressed critics, winning double gold at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition in 2020 and 2021.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and balanced with caramel, vanilla and fruity essence

description.data: Bowmore is a pioneering distillery. We continue to hand down the traditions, skills and expertise that were crafted in 1779, the earliest days of Scotch whisky. Home to one of the world’s oldest Scotch maturation warehouses, the No. 1 Vaults. It’s in this legendary warehouse that Bowmore single malts have been meticulously matured and transformed for over 240 years.

tastingNotesText.data: Rich and Intense. Sherried, complex and nutty. Hints of coca beans with sundried raisins. Muscovado sugar, red berries and an elegant layer of peat smoke.

text.data: Amid Islay’s wild beauty, the fierce seas and Hebridean winds, we’ve been handcrafting single malt Scotch whisky at Bowmore since 1779

An unrivalled heritage, the fresh water from the River Laggan, barley malted in our proprietary malt barns, perfectly-timed fermentation periods, and the magnificent character of Islay all come together to create Bowmore Single Malt Scotch Whisky

It’s in our legendary No. 1 Vaults that the magical character of Islay and centuries of tradition patiently combine to create a whisky that stands out for its complex balance of smokiness and minerality

description.data: Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka offers an aroma of delicious sweet strawberry along with hints of vanilla and berries. On the palate, enjoy strawberry cream flavors with a pleasant and lingering tart strawberry finish. Try a Strawberry Spritzer cocktail by combining one-part Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka, three parts white wine, and one-part club soda over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a strawberry slice or lemon wedge. Or for an adult twist on a summer classic, enjoy a Pinnacle Strawberry Lemonade by adding one-part Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka, two parts lemonade and a splash of lemon-lime soda over ice in a tall glass with a strawberry slice or lemon wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: If you're looking for a smooth, sweet and easy-to-drink whisky, you've found it. Maker's Mark Classic Bourbon was carefully developed by sixth-generation distiller Bill Samuels Sr. to be just that. Still made to his unique recipe, this full-flavored bourbon is subtly woody with flavors of vanilla, caramel and fruit. It's easy to drink neat, and can pull its weight in a cocktail. Mix it with ginger ale and lime for an effortless long drink.This one literally changed the way we think about bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr., wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's approachably smooth. To ensure consistency, we still rotate every barrel by hand and age our bourbon to taste, not time. Just like Bill would have wanted. Once it's ready it's bottled at 90 proof, hand-dipped in our signature red wax. Just think of it as our seal of approval.Since its establishment, Maker's Mark has continually impressed critics, winning double gold at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition in 2020 and 2021.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and balanced with caramel, vanilla and fruity essence

Each bottle is still hand-dipped in our instantly recognizable red wax
Every drop is crafted at Star Hill Farm, Loretto, Kentucky
2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition Double Gold

description.data: Blending fine Cruzan Rum with the sweet, juicy taste of ripe peaches, Cruzan Peach Rum offers a flavor reminiscent of the summer season’s finest fruit harvest. You may want to find a front porch to sit on as you slowly sip this sweet concoction. A perfect complement to your light spring and summer cocktails, this rum is best served with your favorite fruit juices or refreshing mixers like ginger ale, honey syrup or lemon juice. Mix up a Paradise Punch cocktail by combining 12 parts Cruzan Peach Rum, four and one-half parts honey syrup and three parts lemon juice in a pitcher. Stir, then add 12 parts of ginger ale before serving over ice. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

description.data: Laphroaig Quarter Cask has a depth of flavor achieved through a double maturation process. Along with the signature smoky taste of our peated whisky you'll also find notes of coconut, vanilla and banana that are imparted by close contact with American white oak. This delicious whisky should be served simply — over ice, on its own or with a splash of cold water. It starts its life the same way all Laphroaig whiskies do, in a time-honored tradition which has been perfected over two centuries. The malted barley is first smoked then dried over a fire fuelled by peat, hand-cut on the Isle of Islay. After fermentation it's aged in first-fill bourbon barrels, made from American oak. While the whisky is still young it's transferred to much smaller quarter casks. This gives the spirit more contact with the wood, imparting warm and spicy oak flavors. It's a method which was almost lost to time, but has been revived in this whisky. Finally, it is left to rest in our warehouse on the shores of the Atlantic Ocean. Each sip of Laphroaig recalls the passion and hard work of the master distillers who have been perfecting each expression of this peated whisky since 1815. The natural features of Islay lend extra flavor to each complex blend, from the pure waters of the Kilbride stream to the smoky peat found on this rugged island. Laphroaig Quarter Cask has impressed critics, taking home Gold awards from the 2019 San Francisco World Spirits Aware and the 2019 SIP Awards.

tastingNotesText.data: Deep, complex and smoky yet offers and surprises the palate with a gentle sweetness

text.data: Aged twice: once in ex-bourbon barrels and once in quarter casks
Maturation in smaller casks pays tribute to historic tradition

American oak lends flavors of coconut, banana and vanilla
2019 San Francisco World Spirits Award Gold

description.data: Energize your cocktails with DeKuyper Melon Schnapps Liqueur. Add a refreshing twist to your favorite cocktails with the fresh taste of melons. With a subtle but recognizable sweetness, this liqueur pairs well with rum, tequila or vodka. Pour it with Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps and sour mix over ice for a sweet and sour Newton's Cocktail, perfect for a hot summer day. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. description.data: Jim Beam Double Oak, a bourbon crafted with double the precision, undergoes a unique aging process. Initially aged in newly charred American White Oak barrels, it is then poured into a second freshly charred white oak barrel for a second maturation, intensifying its flavor and ensuring a remarkably smooth taste. This multi-barreled approach begins with Jim Beam Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, the World’s #1 Bourbon. Following the traditional 4-year aging process, the bourbon is transferred to a second freshly charred American White Oak barrel, enhancing its taste to perfection. The second barreling results in a double-oaked bourbon with an even deeper level of distinctive, spiced oakiness and rich caramel, creating a premium and intensely smooth whiskey. Jim Beam Double Oak, twice barreled, ensures there's enough flavor to go around. As the First Family of Bourbon, Jim Beam's seven generations of master distillers continue the family tradition with Jim Beam Double Oak. Innovating and taking bourbon to new heights, the brand remains dedicated to pushing the story forward and preserving the legacy of Jacob Beam for the next generation of bourbon enthusiasts since their first batch in 1795.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold intense bourbon

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: Jim Beam Black is a premium bourbon that is, and always will be, extra-aged for taste and bottled only when it's just right. Jim Beam Black has a balanced, rich, and flavorful character with a deep mix of oak, cinnamon, and vanilla aromas. The result of the extra-aging is a full-bodied bourbon with an extra level of elegance and refinement that's meant to be sipped and savored. Enjoy Jim Beam Black neat, on the rocks, or in a cocktail - either way, this refined whiskey pleases with every sip. And, of course, just like our original Jim Beam, it's best when shared with others.

description.data: Pinnacle Pomegranate Vodka offers a burst of exotic flavor for a pleasantly tart sweetness on the palate. Create ultimate vodka drinks by adding a bright twist to lemonade, soda or your favorite fruit juice. Try a Pinnacle® Pomegranate Bellini-tini by combining one and one-half parts Pinnacle Pomegranate Vodka with four parts chilled champagne in a champagne flute rimmed with sugar pearls and top with a splash of grenadine. Or enjoy a Pinnacle Pomegranate Pineapple Cosmo by combining two parts Pinnacle Pomegranate Vodka, one part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur, one-half part orange juice, two parts pineapple juice and a splash of cranberry juice. Shake well with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lime wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: Experience the well-earned, full flavor of Knob Creek 7 Year Old Kentucky Straight Rye Whiskey. This rye whiskey is patiently aged for seven years in deeply charred barrels and bottled at 100 proof for the signature Knob Creek full flavor. This full-bodied Kentucky features balanced black pepper, sweet vanilla and caramel notes with lingering oak and rich spice on the finish. Enjoy Knob Creek 7 Year Rye neat, on the rocks or in your favorite cocktails. This bottle of whiskey is 50% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly. Explore the entire Knob Creek Family for yourself and discover what whiskey was meant to be.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold rye spiciness with undertones of vanilla and oak

description.data: Pinnacle Citrus Vodka offers a bright lemon-lime zest aroma with a fresh and balanced citrus finish on the palate. Splash this refreshing citrus vodka into lemon-lime or club soda for a punch of bright flavor. Enjoy a Pinnacle Cran Tropic-tini by combining one part Pinnacle Citrus Vodka with one part each of pineapple and cranberry juice. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass and a pineapple wedge garnish. For a summer party by the pool, mix up a pitcher of Pinnacle Citrus Sangria by combining six parts Pinnacle Citrus Vodka, three parts DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps, three parts Fresh Lemon Sour, and one 750mL bottle of New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc. Chill for at least 30 minutes before adding ice and lemon and lime slices to the pitcher and pouring in tall glasses to serve. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: Maker’s 46 redefines bourbon with a unique experience crafted by Bill Samuels, Jr., the legacy of Maker’s Mark founders. Introduced in 2010, it stands as the first major expression since classic Maker’s in 1953. This exceptional bourbon undergoes a distinctive finishing process, aging longer with seared French oak staves. Ten of these staves are placed into cask strength Maker’s Mark barrels, allowing the whisky to mature in optimal conditions. The result is a bourbon with layered notes, balanced complexity, and a longer finish, featuring caramel, vanilla, and baking spice. Maker's 46 is a testament to Bill Samuels, Jr.'s taste vision, pushing bourbon craftsmanship boundaries. The wood-finishing series, initiated by Maker’s 46, led to expressions like Maker's Mark Private Selection. With a commitment to experimentation and honoring the founders' legacy, Maker’s 46 invites enthusiasts to savor a bourbon that reimagines tradition while reflecting the enduring dedication of Bill and Margie to exceptional spirits.

tastingNotesText.data: Very intense flavors; a big crescendo of wood blending perfectly with deep, complex, rich notes of vanilla and caramel

description.data: Tart and sweet, DeKuyper Pucker Grape Schnapps Liqueur adds a fruit-flavored kick to your favorite drinks. Tart, purple and delicious, this liqueur puts flavor and fun into all your drinks. With its intense grape taste, it makes a mouth-watering, colorful flavor shot with a tangy finish. Mix it up with Pucker® Cherry and Sour Apple Schnapps and a splash of orange juice, pour over ice for a Fruit Juice Slammer, refreshing and sweet any time of year. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, rich, and bitter.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

description.data: Pinnacle Habanero Vodka offers a spicy blend of habanero peppers with lingering heat and spice. Lightly acidic chili pepper touches the nose while the taste on the mouth has a slight sweetness up front with ripe and spicy habanero pepper on the finish. Try a Pinnacle Peppery Pineapple cocktail by combining one part Pinnacle Habanero Vodka with one-half part pineapple juice and one-quarter part lemon juice. Rim a glass with crushed sea salt. description.data: Discover the essence of Laphroaig 10, a peated Scotch whisky from Islay. Crafted using a generations-old method, this special edition comes in a twisted tube. With a surprising sweetness, it's a classic, full-bodied single malt offering notes of smoke, seaweed, peat, and a hint of salt—evoking Scotland's rugged coast. Ideal for novices and connoisseurs, enjoy it neat or over ice. Sourced from Islay's natural features, the whisky is made with water from Kilbride Stream and malted barley cold-smoked over Islay peat. The unique distilling process, developed over 200 years, remains unchanged since Ian Hunter laid it down 75 years ago. Established in 1815, Laphroaig is known for its truly unique Scotch whisky. Laphroaig 10, the foundation for other expressions, has won awards, including a Gold medal at the 2019 San Francisco World Spirits Competition and recognition in Jim Murray's Whisky Bible as 2019's Best Single Malt Scotch 10 Years & Under.

tastingNotesText.data: Surprising sweetness with hints of salt and layers of peatiness

description.data: The legend of The Tyrconnell was born in 1876, when R.M. Delamere entered his chestnut colt, Tyrconnell, in the prestigious National Product Stakes horse race. Fortune found favor with Delamere that afternoon, as Tyrconnell bested horses and oddsmakers alike on his march to victory. The surprise victory captured the imagination of the assembled crowd, which included the Watts, a local family who had built a thriving whiskey distillery. They chose to commemorate the occasion by creating a limited edition, small batch whiskey that bore the name of their local champion.Although the Watts intended to make The Tyrconnell just once, it ended up becoming their most popular whiskey. Before Prohibition, The Tyrconnell was claimed to be the best selling Irish whiskey. Today, the brand is maintained by the Kilbeggan Distilling Company, proud protectors of the Irish whiskey making traditions. Each bottle bears the same commemorative label celebrating Tyrconnell's triumph.

tastingNotesText.data: A tang of oranges and lemons with a strong malt presence that balances well with the oily sweetness

description.data: Crafted with fine Cruzan Rum, this strawberry flavored spirit offers the light and sweet taste of freshly-picked ripe strawberries. Perfect for mixing into cocktails, this rum is ideal for a strawberry daiquiri or use it to add a sweet touch to a refreshing summer punch. Try a Strawberry Basil Smash cocktail by muddling one half of a lime quartered with six basil leaves and one teaspoon of sugar. Add one part each Cruzan Strawberry Rum and Cruzan Aged Light Rum and ice. Shake, pour into a rocks glass and top with soda water and a basil leaf garnish. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

description.data: Truly unique, and steeped in history, El Tesoro is one of the last known tequilas to fully embrace the traditional tequila making process. A tequila crafted with knowledge passed down through centuries and infused with the passion of its makers, El Tesoro honors Don Felipe Camarena, the man who established La Altena Distillery in 1937.  Today his grandson, Carlos Camarena, oversees production. Just like his grandfather, he is passionate about agave and fiercely protective of his traditional methods. Every decision, every part of the painstaking process, is done in celebration of this unique treasure. Shunning efficiency in favor of a commitment to meticulous care and attention to detail - El Tesoro  is a precious tequila, waiting to be discovered.

tastingNotesText.data: Clean, crisp flavor of blue agave that best typifies what tequila is all about

description.data: Hardin’s Creek is an ongoing series of limited releases featuring some of our rarest and most unique whiskies. Boston is the third of three special releases within our Kentucky Series. Our Booker Noe campus in Boston, Kentucky is one of a kind. With very few trees and strong winds, our rack houses spread out generously in the golden sunshine, surrounded by three lakes and constant air flow, ideal conditions for maturation. These unique conditions mean a faster, richer aging.  Fine ingredients soon become fine bourbon. Sip Hardin's Creek Boston Bourbon Whiskey neat or on the rocks and note flavors of soft caramel and vanilla with oak tones, as well as faded hazelnut.

description.data: Gently matured in ex-Bourbon barrels, Laphroaig 16 year old whisky is a mellow twist on our unforgettable Islay single malt Scotch. The signature medicinal and smoky flavors are met with floral notes of heather, the sweetness of honey and a touch of spicy chili. The additional years spent patiently resting in American oak also impart a hint of leather, vanilla and treacle. It's best served simply — poured over ice, with a splash of cold water, or neat. As it's a limited release, it makes a thoughtful gift for whisky collectors and those looking for something unusual. It's also an ideal dram for fans of our standard 10 year old expression who want something more celebratory. Laphroaig 16 is made to a time-honored process, which starts with malted barley slowly dried and toasted over a fire fuelled by the Isle of Islay's native peat. It's then mixed with the clean, cool waters of the Kilbride stream before being distilled. The spirit is poured into our ex-Bourbon barrels — gently charred inside for a stronger flavor — and then left to mature in our warehouse on the rugged shores of the Atlantic Ocean. This limited edition Scotch whisky was first released in 2015 to celebrate 200 years since the Laphroaig distillery first opened. With two centuries of passion and experience to draw upon, this whisky was extremely well-received. We decided to release another exclusive run so that more could sample this mellow edition of our quintessential peated whisky.

tastingNotesText.data: Each sip brings sweet flavors of treacle, caramel and manuka honey merged with wood smoke and bergamot. A spicy mouthfeel leads into a long lasting finish filled with the classic Laphroaig flavors of smoke, seaweed and medicine.

text.data: Single malt Scotch whisky aged for 16 years in ex-Bourbon barrels
First released in 2015 to commemorate 200 years of Laphroaig
Rich and smoky with flavors of peat, leather and vanilla
Mellow and soft texture due to longer maturation

description.data: Crafted with extracts of blackberries blended with fine brandy, DeKuyper Blackberry Flavored Brandy makes a mouthwatering treat. Only the finest fruits are selected and specially blended to bring out the full-bodied blackberry taste. Sip it on its own for a smooth, full-bodied drink or balance your favorite cocktails with its deep blackberry flavor. Perfect in any season, accentuate the flavors of fall by blending it with a pint of hard apple cider or a Bramble in summer, melding its berry taste with gin, fresh lemon juice and sugar syrup. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and tart and tangy flavor of fresh cherries.

description.data: Straight from the grove, this zesty orange vodka captures the juicy burst and citrus punch of a freshly squeezed orange. Shake it up with your favorite fruit juice or soda for a citrus explosion. Enjoy a Pinnacle Sunset Martini by combining two parts Pinnacle Orange Vodka with one part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur and one-half part fresh lime juice. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass and an orange twist garnish. Or try a Pinnacle Orange Fizz cocktail by mixing two parts Pinnacle Orange Fizz with one part each lemon-lime soda and cranberry juice over ice and with an orange slice garnish. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: There’s one thing that goes together with Wimbledon only second to the tennis itself, and it’s the epitome of British summertime: strawberries. The iconic strawberries served at Wimbledon are grown at historic Hugh Lowe Farms. Picked less than 40 miles from both Wimbledon and the Sipsmith Distillery, these grade-one strawberries usually find themselves at Wimbledon accompanied by a bowl of cream. However, in the absence of the Championships last year due to the pandemic, these meticulously grown ruby red strawberries instead were used to celebrate Sipsmith being the official gin partner of the Wimbledon Championships. Wimbledon strawberries and Sipsmith Gin have joined to create one winning match!

description.data: Once a small burn, it sits on the Atlantic thrashed edges of Scotland’s whisky map, looking down into a hollow by a bay home of the Laphroaig distillery. If you’ve been, then you will know that it is a treeless place, a place of bracken and bog, a place of nature, raw and beautiful. You will know that its waters are the reason why, over 200 years ago, two cattle farming brothers began to distil whisky here; that it once powered the distillery’s waterwheels; and that today it continues to cool the wort and condense the vapours during the distillation process. Most of all, you will know that it is a prized ingredient in any bottle of Laphroaig, its peaty, mineral free waters adding to the spirit’s rich smoky flavours. Set into a beautifully crafted book that will document a part of Ian’s rich legacy. Every year a new chapter will be told, uncovering the extensive history behind Laphroaig and the characters who created it, making this a collection unlike any other, and one that is treasured by Laphroaig fans across the world.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, syrupy, fruity, followed by creamy licorice notes

text.data: The most richly flavored of all Scotch whiskies

Serve neat, with a large cube of ice, or a drop of water

description.data: Experience the embrace of "Wa" oneness/harmony with Hibiki Japanese Harmony whisky. This careful blend of handcrafted Japanese whiskies  creates an orchestra of sweet, floral and woody flavors.Rose, lychee and sandalwood aromas tempt the nose, while each sip brings harmonious flavors of honeyed sweetness with candied orange and white chocolate. It's best served simply in the ultimate Japanese experience of Omotenashi. Pour into your favorite crystal rocks glass over a marugori: a hand-carved ice ball that melts slowly for a leisurely experience. It will transport you to Japan, where you can feel the harmony between nature and people. Hibiki Japanese Harmony is a meticulous blend of countless Japanese malt and grain whiskies, which come together in harmony. It pays tribute to craftsmanship and nature, and in particular, the 24 expressions of nature traditionally found in the Japanese calendar. This is further reflected by the distinct bottle, which has 24 facets.First created in 1989, to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the Suntory Corporation, Hibiki was destined to be the paragon blend. The name Hibiki means "resonance", and over the past three decades it has certainly made its mark. A winner of  numerous awards (ICS gold 2021 and 2020), it has taken its place among the most revered whiskies in the world.

tastingNotesText.data: Honey-like sweetness, candied orange peel, white chocolate

description.data: With winds of at least 137 knots, the Category 5 hurricane is unrelenting. In September 2017, Hurricane Maria ripped through the US Virgin Islands, causing severe damage to homes, communication networks, and the power grid. On Cruzan’s home of St. Croix, neighbors came together to help each other and renew their island, inspiring Cruzan Rum to amplify and sustain this “Island Spirit”. Bottled at 137 proof, Cruzan Hurricane Proof rum pays tribute to the resilient spirit that allows communities to stand strong in the face of disaster – a bold reminder that together we can weather any storm. Following the devastating 2017 Atlantic Hurricane season, Cruzan Rum established the Island Spirit Fund to ensure no community weathers a storm alone. A portion of proceeds from every bottle of Cruzan Hurricane Proof Rum supports disaster recovery efforts in the US Virgin Islands and across the United States. For more detail on the Island Spirit Fund, visit cruzanrum.com.

description.data: Cruzan Mango Rum delivers the sweet, bold, tropical ﬂavor of ripe mangos. Exceptionally smooth and refreshing on a hot summer day, spend a little one-on-one time with this one. The tropical mango flavor pairs best with fresh fruit juices. For a new twist on a classic, try a Mango Mojito by muddling four chunks of fresh mango with 4-6 mint leaves with a splash of simple syrup; add a dash of freshly squeezed lime juice, one part Cruzan® Mango Rum, and ice. Stir and top with soda water and a mint leaf. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Before Jim Beam Bourbon, the Beam family made Old Tub, an unfiltered bonded bourbon which was the foundation for what would become the world's number one bourbon. description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: EFFEN Vodka starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid. Then it is distilled continuously at temperatures below 85 degrees, creating a vodka with no traces of burnt sugar. After that, it’s filtered through a column of active carbon to deliver optimal filtration. Finally, it’s blended with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water, producing a clean, smooth vodka.Yuzu is a Japanese citrus fruit that is valued for it's highly aromatic rind, and has benefited from the larger Asian/global flavor trend. Yuzu is often described as the meeting of a lemon and a grapefruit.

description.data: Founded in Islay in 1779, Bowmore is the home of the world's oldest Scotch Maturation Warehouse, The Legendary No.1 Vaults.Exclusively matured in first and second fill ex bourbon casks, then blissfully married together, Small Batch exhibits the best qualities of both. First-fill bourbon offers delicious vanilla sweetness, subtle spices and bourbon oak smoke to complement Bowmore's gentle peaty smokiness, while the second-fill cask enhances Bowmore's fresh fruity complexity and showcases its trademark honey and creamy malt character.

description.data: Featuring a sweet, fresh, authentic taste of bananas, Cruzan Banana Rum’s tropical flavor makes any exotic cocktail come to life. Try blending it with strawberries, lime juice, crushed ice and a dash of sugar for a refreshing strawberry banana daiquiri. Mix up a Banana Nana cocktail by pouring one part each Cruzan Banana and Aged Dark Rum and orange juice over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a banana slice and enjoy. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

Most ultra-premium vodkas are charcoal filtered, which can add a flavor that is not optimal for both taste and finish

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Plata Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Plata is made from 100% blue agave for a smooth-tasting plata tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring playful citrus notes along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Plata Tequila also offers a short but smooth finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita or Paloma, Hornitos Plata delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

description.data: Teacher’s Highland Cream is a smooth and complex whisky, renowned for its high malt content. The diligent blending process creates a richer Scotch with a balanced smoky peatiness, offering a flavour closest to the original taste of Scotch whisky. A dram of Teachers, served with water, brings the deliciously rich smoky notes and the signature creamy finish to life. It’s the perfect Scotch whisky to relax with, and  enjoy during genuine moments with close friends, family & peers.Following traditions set down by William Teacher in the 19th Century, each drop is carefully crafted using fully smoked peated single malt whisky from the Ardmore distillery. The signature whisky in every blend of Teacher’s Highland Cream, it gives an incredible depth and smokiness combined with rich undertones.From the gritty streets of Glasgow to the lush hills of Aberdeenshire, the distinct and recognisable taste of Teachers  reliably represents its heritage. It’s the story of a craft that runs generations deep. It was in Glasgow where William Teacher started adding more than the usual amount of malt to his blended whisky, over 180 years ago. He  wasn’t one to worry about public opinion. More malt meant better taste. It gave Teachers its own light and  golden glow,and still does to this day. This peated malt distilled in Aberdeenshire’s Ardmore Distillery is still the soul of the whisky. It stands as proof that one man’s self-belief can make good things happen.

tastingNotesText.data: There is a challenging and exciting taste that at the same time is round and warming. This superb flavor is full of rich malts and maturity that slowly fades to a silky rounded texture

text.data: Exceptionally high in peated malt content for balanced creaminess

Matured 100% in American Oakwood casks to add richness

description.data: Experience the well-earned, full flavor of Knob Creek 7 Year Old Kentucky Straight Rye Whiskey. description.data: With its intense sweet and tart grape aroma, this juicy grape vodka features a burst of juicy, ripe Concord grapes with a light, flavorful finish on the palate. Create a Pinnacle Grape Cosmo by combining two parts Pinnacle Grape Vodka with one part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur and one-half part DeKuyper Razzmatazz Raspberry Liqueur. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass and an orange slice garnish. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: This aged rum is combined with a unique mix of nine spices creating a rich amber colored rum that delivers layer after complex layer of taste. Complex flavors of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg and toasted wood offer a unique experience while the nine spices include: allspice, vanilla, pepper, ginger, mace, clove, nutmeg, cinnamon and juniper berry. Enjoy this uniquely spiced rum neat or add a hint of spice to your favorite cocktail. Try a Spiced Rum Punch by combining one and one-quarter parts Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum with four parts orange juice and one part cranberry juice over ice with a lime wedge garnish. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: DeKuyper Triple Sec Cordial brings the essence of orange to your favorite cocktails. DeKuyper's blend meticulously melds the flavors of sweet and bitter oranges from distilled dried peels for a one-of-a-kind liqueur. An essential ingredient in any bartender's repertoire, this cordial has a pronounced and lingering citrus taste. description.data: The diverse whiskey expertise of Fred Noe and Shinji Fukoyo have come together once again to collaborate, challenge and progress the limits of bourbon. Pacific Reserve is the 2nd collaboration from our legendary founders and contains a one-of-a-kind whiskey. Our liquid starts as a Kentucky Bourbon that’s aged 8 years.  The base bourbon then travels more than 6,000 miles to the Yamazaki Distillery in Koyoto, Japan where it is partially aged in wine, sherry and ex-Yamazaki sherry casks and harmoniously blended to create a complex bourbon with layers of flavor.

tastingNotesText.data: Soft balance of oak, spice, sweetness with light acidity

description.data: Add a silky banana boost to your favorite cocktails with DeKuyper Crème de Banana. Bursting with the smooth, delicious taste of ripe bananas, this gold liqueur is distilled with top-grade banana extract. Sweet without overpowering, its flavor is a great base for exotic long drinks and cocktails, essential for coladas and flips. Bring refined banana flavor to desserts, pour over ice cream or stir with hot coffee or espresso. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Plata Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Plata is made from 100% blue agave for a smooth-tasting plata tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring playful citrus notes along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Plata Tequila also offers a short but smooth finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita or Paloma, Hornitos Plata delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

Tres Generaciones Reposado rests in American oak barrels for at least four months to deliver an initial spiciness of toasted oak with a background of herbs and fresh agave. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in classic cocktails, Tres Generaciones Reposado delivers sweet, spicy flavor in every sip. Combine with triple sec and lime juice for an elevated margarita, or enjoy simply with soda water and lime to experience the layered flavor this tequila offers. Each bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

description.data: Our old-school Jim Beam Rye recipe is marked by a warm, spicy kick and a bite of black pepper, all rounded out by hints of vanilla and oak. Add it to classic and contemporary cocktails alike for an unmistakable flavor. As a pre-Prohibition style rye whiskey, it pays homage to one of our family’s oldest recipes and is distilled according to the same exacting standards that have governed Jim Beam for two centuries. Today, it’s become a go-to for bartenders looking for a bolder, bygone take on whiskey with the smoother finish of more modern times.

tastingNotesText.data: Spicy and warm with a bit of a black pepper bite which gives way to vanilla and oak undertones

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

description.data: John “Calico Jack” Rackham redefined the art of piracy. His career began under Captain Charles Vane, until Jack staged a mutiny and took control, destined for more adventurous pursuits. Calico Jack was the kind of man who set his own course and followed it however he saw fit. He went on to create the Jolly Roger flag and that black banner emblazoned with skull and cross swords, striking fear in the hearts of men everywhere should they be unfortunate enough for Calico Jack to approach. Calico Jack Silver is a crisp and clean silver rum – as refreshing as an ocean breeze, with just enough spice to keep things interesting.

description.data: EFFEN Vodka starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid. Then it is distilled continuously at temperatures below 85 degrees, creating a vodka with no traces of burnt sugar. After that, it’s filtered through a column of active carbon to deliver optimal filtration. Finally, it’s blended with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water, producing a clean, smooth vodka.Yuzu is a Japanese citrus fruit that is valued for it's highly aromatic rind, and has benefited from the larger Asian/global flavor trend. Yuzu is often described as the meeting of a lemon and a grapefruit.

tastingNotesText.data: Slight sweetness with herbal and fruity tones balanced with grapefruit zest

description.data: Experience the extraordinary with Jim Beam Single Barrel, where only the top 1% of barrels make the cut. Each bottle is a unique masterpiece, reflecting the distinct flavors shaped by factors like rack house placement, Kentucky seasons, and aging duration. Like snowflakes, no two barrels are alike, and less than 1% yield the perfect bourbon—a rare occurrence shaped by circumstance. Handpicked by expert distillers, these exceptional barrels become Jim Beam Single Barrel, each bottle individually labeled and hand-numbered. This bourbon celebrates individuality, not just in taste but also with its handwritten label, a true testament to the one-of-a-kind flavor profile of each batch. Jim Beam Single Barrel carries the legacy of seven generations of master distillers, showcasing the family tradition while embracing innovation. As the First Family of Bourbon, Jim Beam has been a pioneer since the beginning, never resting on laurels but consistently pushing bourbon to new heights. With over two centuries of history, the Jim Beam way remains unchanged—always innovating, always perfecting bourbon.

tastingNotesText.data: Full-bodied, surprisingly smooth

description.data: This well-balanced, flavored vodka brings out the best of dark blueberry and bright strawberry. The aroma is a clean blend of sweet, dark berries while the taste bursts with flavors of bold, ripe blueberries and sweet vibrant strawberries. Add a clean, fruity punch to a fresh Pinnacle Triple Berry Tart cocktail by shaking with ice, two parts Pinnacle Berry Vodka with one-part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur, one part cranberry juice and a splash of fresh lime juice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry. For a new twist on a brunch classic, try a Pinnacle Berry Screwdriver by mixing one part Pinnacle Berry Vodka with two parts orange juice and ice, garnish with an orange slice. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Tart ripe berries, with a hint of sweetness.

description.data: With winds of at least 137 knots, the Category 5 hurricane is unrelenting. In September 2017, Hurricane Maria ripped through the US Virgin Islands, causing severe damage to homes, communication networks, and the power grid. On Cruzan’s home of St. Croix, neighbors came together to help each other and renew their island, inspiring Cruzan Rum to amplify and sustain this “Island Spirit”. Bottled at 137 proof, Cruzan Hurricane Proof rum pays tribute to the resilient spirit that allows communities to stand strong in the face of disaster – a bold reminder that together we can weather any storm. Following the devastating 2017 Atlantic Hurricane season, Cruzan Rum established the Island Spirit Fund to ensure no community weathers a storm alone. A portion of proceeds from every bottle of Cruzan Hurricane Proof Rum supports disaster recovery efforts in the US Virgin Islands and across the United States. For more detail on the Island Spirit Fund, visit cruzanrum.com.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth and sweet.

description.data: Straight from the grove, this zesty orange vodka captures the juicy burst and citrus punch of a freshly squeezed orange. Shake it up with your favorite fruit juice or soda for a citrus explosion. Enjoy a Pinnacle Sunset Martini by combining two parts Pinnacle Orange Vodka with one part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur and one-half part fresh lime juice. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass and an orange twist garnish. Or try a Pinnacle Orange Fizz cocktail by mixing two parts Pinnacle Orange Fizz with one part each lemon-lime soda and cranberry juice over ice and with an orange slice garnish. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: This ultra-premium, limited-time special release features the same high-rye mash bill that Basil Hayden fans know and love, finished in hickory smoked, new charred oak barrels, delivering delicate campfire notes that perfectly complement the base flavor profile. This secondary finishing results in an aroma of mellow smoke character with a hint of sweet vanilla, followed by a palate with notes of soft char and a light sweetness reminiscent of caramel and maple. The delicate smokiness in this expression provides a unique profile, while still holding true to the approachability and refinement of all Basil Hayden offerings. Perfected and second to none.

description.data: Bring satisfying coffee flavor to your favorite drinks with DeKuyper Coffee Liqueur. Perfect poured over or mixed into your favorite desserts, its bold coffee flavor infuses cocktails with subtle warm notes of vanilla, caramel and chocolate. Serve it with vodka and cream over ice for a delicious White Russian, balancing subtle bittersweet coffee taste, vodka heat and silky cream. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise with modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Elementary and world famous, DeKuyper Blue Curacao Liqueur is a solid basis for creating classic cocktails. Synonymous with island flavor, this DeKuyper favorite is harmoniously blended from distilled extracts of oranges, lemons, and Curacao fruit. The essence of this liqueur is the Curacao or Lahara fruit, famous for being bitter. Balanced for sweetness, this blue liqueur is incredibly useful in crafting distinctive drinks. Since 1695, DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor, and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Bitterness of the Curacao (Lahara) fruit is balanced with sweet citrus notes.

description.data: Kilbeggan® Single Pot Still is a glorious tribute to the town and those who kept its whiskey alive, proudly wearing the colour of County Westmeath on its label. It is the second limited release whiskey to be 100% distilled and matured at Ireland’s oldest licensed distillery, and the oldest expression to be released since distillation resumed at Kilbeggan in 2010, following the award-winning Kilbeggan® Small Batch Rye. Double distilled, once through the oldest working whiskey pot still in the world, Kilbeggan® Single Pot Still is a unique mash of malted barley, raw barley, and 2.5% oats that was inspired by historical recipes from the distillery’s heyday in the late-1800s.

tastingNotesText.data: Spice becomes apparent but not overbearing with summer fruits and citrus. Warming mid palate with a fresh mint leaf flavour leading on to a rich creamy mouthfeel.

description.data: The Tres Generaciones brand was born from three generations of pioneering, perseverance, and pride. Cristalino, the newest creation from our master distillers at La Perseverancia Distillery, is the next bold step in that ongoing journey. This exceptional tequila starts as 100% weber blue agave which is triple distilled for exceptional smoothness. It is then rested in American white oak barrels for at least 12 months to enhance its character adding an array of subtle flavors, and a unique smoky finish. Finally, this aged liquid is filtered through diatomaceous earth to gently extract the color, rounding out the flavor profile. The result is a unique, crystal clear, incredibly smooth tequila balancing light wood notes with a sweet and creamy taste.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet with tannins that give a light bitterness, creamy and slightly thick consistency, smooth not astringent.

text.data: Añejo Cristalino is a super-premium tequila that is triple distilled and carbon filtered for exceptional smoothness and character
This crystal clear tequila features aromas of light wood followed by vanilla and honey
A smooth tequila that finishes with a unique smokiness

description.data: If you're looking for a smooth, sweet and easy-to-drink whisky, you've found it. Maker's Mark Classic Bourbon was carefully developed by sixth-generation distiller Bill Samuels Sr. to be just that. Still made to his unique recipe, this full-flavored bourbon is subtly woody with flavors of vanilla, caramel and fruit. It's easy to drink neat, and can pull its weight in a cocktail. Mix it with ginger ale and lime for an effortless long drink.This one literally changed the way we think about bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr., wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's approachably smooth. To ensure consistency, we still rotate every barrel by hand and age our bourbon to taste, not time. Just like Bill would have wanted. Once it's ready it's bottled at 90 proof, hand-dipped in our signature red wax. Just think of it as our seal of approval.Since its establishment, Maker's Mark has continually impressed critics, winning double gold at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition in 2020 and 2021.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and balanced with caramel, vanilla and fruity essence

text.data: Carefully sourced red winter wheat gives Maker's a unique sweetness
Years of aging in new, seared American oak barrels adds tons of flavor
Each bottle is still hand-dipped in our instantly recognizable red wax
Every drop is crafted at Star Hill Farm, Loretto, Kentucky
2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition Double Gold

description.data: This blend explores the harmonious combination of 3 distinct liquid profiles for one memorable whiskey. It begins with Kentucky Rye, providing a firm base of spicy rye, rich oak, dried fruit and subtle molasses undertones to build on. Canadian Rye from our award-winning Alberta Distillery is skillfully layered in. This unique rye provides depth to the notes of dried fruit and a more viscous mouth feel than a traditional rye. It's then finished with a touch of California Port blended in directly to add complementary juicy, ripe fruit without muddying the existing wood notes. The end result is a whiskey full in flavor and still delicately nuanced. Basil Hayden Dark Rye is always perfect sipped on the rocks as well as in a Boulevardier.

tastingNotesText.data: Complex blend of caramel, dried fruit, and oak with back notes of spice and a rounded mouthfeel

description.data: Come alive with the seasons of Japan with every sip of Roku gin. In Japan, Roku means "the number six", andeach bottle is infused with six unique Japanese botanicals that ripen throughout the year.The fresh and clean aroma of Roku gin flows in to flavors of floral cherry blossom (sakura) and earthy sencha(green tea). The best way to serve is in a Japanese twist on the classic G&T. Pour over ice and top up withtonic water. Garnish with thin slices of ginger to bring out the gin's unique herbal and citrus notes.Roku gin celebrates all four seasons of Japan, and its botanicals are carefully harvested at the peak of theirseason—the "shun". Sakura leaves and flowers are handpicked in spring, with Sencha and Gyokuro teas beingplucked in summer. In fall it's time for the spicy Sansho pepper, and the zingy Yuzu fruit bursts into ripeness inwinter. They are captured, distilled and blended harmoniously in each bottle so drinkers can experience a yearin Japan with every sip.Roku gin is a celebration of the bounty of nature and careful craftsmanship, drawing upon more than a centuryof distilling experience and expertise.

tastingNotesText.data:
The unparalleled soft, round and subtly sweet taste of Roku gin comes from its unique infusion of carefully sourced Japanese botanicals. Take a
moment to breathe in the floral and sweet aroma of Sakura (cherry blossom) and Sencha (green tea) before taking your first sip. Each complex and
multi-layered mouthful offers a harmonious blend of traditional gin flavors combined with distinct Japanese botanicals. The top note is sweet-sour
yuzu, leading into a crisp finish with the distinctive spice of crisp Sanshō pepper.

text.data: Cherry blossom and green tea provide a floral and sweet aroma
Complex, multi-layered, yet harmonious flavour of various botanicals
Traditional Gin taste in the base, plus characteristic Japanese botanical notes with yuzu (Japanese citrus fruit) as the top note
The crisp Japanese sansho pepper brings a little spiciness to the finish

description.data: With added vanilla extract, fresh lemon distillate and a touch of caramel, deep gold DeKuyper Amaretto takes this traditional liqueur to the next level. Showcasing a rich, amber color, this liqueur delivers the unmistakable aroma of almonds. Each sip of this complex and versatile liqueur carries sweet almond notes to hot coffee drinks, cold shots and colorful cocktails. Smooth and versatile, drink it on its own or add it to sour mix for a delicious Amaretto Sour. description.data: DeKuyper Crème de Cocoa Dark offers all the tempting taste of chocolate in an intensely flavored liqueur. Bring refined cocoa flavor to desserts, pour over ice cream or stir with hot coffee or espresso. Shake it with ice, vanilla vodka and Irish cream for a smooth Chocolate Martini, a dessert and after-dinner cocktail all in one. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. description.data: Knob Creek 15-Year-Old enters the stage as our most mature Knob Creek offering to date. After a decade and half of maturation, Knob Creek 15- Year-Old will entice the nose with delectable caramelized oak and luscious vanilla. Our bourbon will further soothe the palate with smooth caramel and toffee perfectly paired with toasted oak and light leather. Lastly Knob Creek- 15- Year-Old will finish with a warming spice joined by a slight floral bouquet. Join us on a journey, decades in the making, where only the best of the best barrels can claim a home to, Knob Creek 15- Year-Old. Because after all, true maturity comes with age.

description.data: Versatile with a quintessential black currant taste, DeKuyper Crème de Cassis is essential for classic and modern cocktails. Made with black currant extract, this liqueur is perfect for rich flavor and red color to Champagne cocktails. Used as an antidote for snakebites in the 16th century, blackcurrant liqueur has come a long way. Over the years the cordial has been refined, without losing its unique sweet taste. Pour it with Champagne into a champagne flute or coupe for a crisp and sweet Kir Royale or mix with gin and dry vermouth for a crimson Arnaud. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. Best enjoyed in a cocktail with your favorite mixer.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon
An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined, and smooth character
With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla and oak flavor with a lightly sweet finish
Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball

description.data: Laphroaig, meaning "Beautiful hollow by the broad bay" has married malted barley with smoke from our native peat to produce one of the most richly flavoured of all Scotch whiskies since 1813. Distilled on the tiny island of Islay off the west coast of Scotland, the flavour is as untamed as the island itself. This unique expression from Laphroaig combines the unforgettable flavour of our 10 Year Old whisky with the sweet, aromatic flavours from the Oloroso Sherry Casks. This marriage of casks creates a rich, full bodied flavour with notes of Manuka honey, bacon, and maple syrup alongside the classic smoke, seaweed, and hint of salt that Laphroaig is known & loved for.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and aromatic, with rich wax and furniture polish notes followed by treacle toffee, maple syrup, bitter dark chocolate combined with pencil shavings, pine needle, and cedar scented wood.

text.data: This unique expression from Laphroaig combines the unforgettable flavour of our 10 Year Old whisky with the sweet, aromatic flavours from the Oloroso Sherry Casks

The European oak sherry casks are carefully selected to add complexity and balance, while staying true to the character of Lahproaig
Features a finish that is long, sweet, and spicy with chestnut honey and an antiseptic lingering aroma
